description:
I haven't used it and am not downloading it but i felt compelled to comment on the fact that is MORGANA IN THE ICON.

You can't convince me otherwise. It's literally called THIEF MD.

I've not downloaded or used this as well like the other commenter said. What's the story on this? How does someone steal open source? I would be ashamed to download something that's open source yet was stolen from someone else's "for profit" project.
summary: If it's open source, how would it be stealing to use it?

description:
It says it handles .fountain files. Maybe it does, but as any converter. It doesn'
t seem to provide live preview.
Love it, but i would change the name of the app/project thief
Having to click through various views is clunky. And having to use folders instead of files is inconvenient and awkward.
